title: Printer's Sample Book, "Color Book 20. 1883", 1883
medium: Medium: paper and printed cotton textile samples
creditline: Gift of Frederick J. Whitehead from the collection compiled by his father Cornelius Whitehead at the Pacific Print Works of Lawrence, Massachusetts
description: Small notebook with tabbed colors: Blue, Green, Olive, Red, Brown, Orange, Stone, Drabs. Very few textile samples, mostly recipes for dyestuffs.

tombstone.epitaph:
Printer's Sample Book, "Color Book 20. 1883", 1883.
1883. Medium: paper and printed cotton textile samples. Gift of Frederick J. Whitehead from the collection compiled by his father Cornelius Whitehead at the Pacific Print Works of Lawrence, Massachusetts. 1945-55-43.
